content.text:
# Permaculture College Australia

Permaculture College Australia Inc is a not-for-profit sustainability training organisation which conducts the accredited vocational training and community education programs in permaculture at Djanbung Gardens in Nimbin, New South Wales.[http://permaculture.com.au/online/index.php?option=com_content&view=article&id=11:what-is-the-difference-between-permaculture-college-australia-inc-and-djanbung-gardens&catid=7:faqs&Itemid=25 What is the difference between Permaculture College Australia Inc and Djanbung Gardens?]
The full-time APT Certificate III, IV and Diploma in Permaculture are AUSTUDY approved for Australians, who may apply for a student living allowance.[http://www.permacultureaustralia.org.au/2011/02/10/accredited-training-cert-iii-iv-diploma/ Accredited Training Cert III, IV & Diploma | Permaculture Australia]
Permaculture College Australia leases the training facilities and demonstration farm at Djanbung Gardens as its campus.[http://permaculture.tv/robyn-francis-permaculture-college-australia/ Robyn Francis â€“ Permaculture College Australia | Permaculture TV free video cooperative] PCA also conducts permaculture courses at other campuses in Australia and overseas.[http://bellingenchamber.com/permaculture-design-course-in-bellingen-and-nambucca-heads-commencing-march-11 Permaculture Design Course in Bellingen and Nambucca Heads Commencing 11 March | Bellingen Chamber of Commerce]
